text: Environmental Modifiers are mechanics that change the environment and how Plants and Zombies interact with it.
$(br2)There are many types of Environmental Modifiers, here's a list of all of them:
$(br2)Craters prevent non-flying plants from being planted on them.
$(br)They prevent non-flying plants, plants not immune to Fire, and plants that are not Winter Family Plants from being able to be planted on them.
Using an Iceberg Lettuce on a them will destroy them. Ice attacks that damage the field (e.g. Ice-shroom, Chilly Pepper, etc.) destroy them.
Planting Winter Family Plants on top of them instantly destroys them.
They last for 1 minute. They spawn an Imp Dragon Zombie every 18 seconds.
$(br2)Gold Tile produces one Small Sun every 3 minutes if there's a plant on top of them. The Zombie Sun Radius is 10 blocks.
$(br2)They can be removed by right clicking them with a Gold Shovel.
